column6: orthodox, believe that Muhammad's father-in-law Abu Bakr succeeded him & venerate certain recoded oral traditions (hadith)
Yemen, Syria, Jordan, Samalia, Palestine, Malaysia, Kurds, SE Asia, East Africa
India (90%), Pakistan (60%) S & Central Asia, Afghanistan, Russia, Lower Egypt
North & West Africa, UAE, Kuwait, Upper Egypt
believe Muhammad's cousin & son-in-law Ali succeeded him, slightly different beliefs & prayers, emphasise different recorded oral traditions (Hadith)
hold the Qur'an to be the only authentic source of Islamic faith; reject the Hadith
